# GAME STARTS
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Let's work together for the best outcome for everyone! </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
ELEPHANT: Let's work together for the best outcome for everyone!
PARROT: Let's aim for a high overall contribution to maximize our returns!
RABBIT: Let's all contribute to maximize our total payoff!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> 20 coins start in the shared pot. Choose how many coins to take for yourself (your contribution is what remains). Valid choice: either 0 or 20. The pot multiplier is 1.6×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 0 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="20" multiplied_contrib="32.0" active_players="4" redistributed_each="8.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> PARROT=20,RABBIT=0,MONKEY=0 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per reward unit, 3 coins to give a reward of 4.0 coins. It will cost you, per punishment unit, 3 coins to impose a deduction of 7.0 coins. Choose whom to punish/reward and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<PUNISHMENT/REWARD> {"PARROT":1} </PUNISHMENT/REWARD>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"ELEPHANT (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_you":7,"coins_spent_on_reward":3,"coins_rewarded_to_you":0,"payoff":18},"PARROT":{"coins_spent_on_punish":9,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"coins_spent_on_reward":0,"coins_rewarded_to_them":12,"payoff":11},"RABBIT":{"coins_spent_on_punish":3,"coins_deducted_from_them":7,"coins_spent_on_reward":3,"coins_rewarded_to_them":0,"payoff":15},"MONKEY":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":14,"coins_spent_on_reward":3,"coins_rewarded_to_them":0,"payoff":11}}'/>
</ROUND>

<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>

RABBIT: Let's coordinate better. I'll contribute 20 this time if we all aim for the same!

</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
